'''Economy Cuihua Bookshelf''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Economy Cuihua Bookshelf is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=240}}.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=90}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 16h
|Cuihua Wood = 16
|Red Dye = 8
|sort = Cuihua Wood;Red Dye
}}
